text: Zovite ikh (priyomnykh synovey) po imenam ikh rodnykh ottsov, eto - boleye spravedlivo pered Allakhom. A yesli vy ne znayete ikh krovnykh ottsov, to oni - vashi brat'ya po vere i vashi storonniki. Vy ne greshili, kogda otnosili ikh po oshibke k nerodnym ottsam, no grekh v vashem namerenii (yesli otnosite, uznav nastavleniya Allakha po etomu povodu). Allakh proshchayet vam grekhi i prinimayet pokayaniye greshnikov. On - Miloserdnyy i Proshchayushchiy
